cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an amazing 2008 Honda CRV with only a mere 18000 miles on it. Lot of features, great ride.
This is a great 2005 Toyota Rav4 with 83000 miles on it. Good price, runs great.
This is newer 2013 Mazda CX5 with just  22000 miles on it. Looks awesome, still has new car smell.
This Subaru Forester is a quality car with relatively low miles of 89000. Great for a new younger driver.
